During Australia's deeply destructive bushfires, more than 300 American firefighters, including 44 Idahoans, have risked their lives and personal safety to join the effort to combat these deadly fires. I am proud of and humbled by our firefighters’ courageous response.

Defending against the novel #coronavirus will take an all-hands-on-deck effort, and I thank our public health officials and medical providers for their tireless work to contain this situation and navigate the challenges before us.
As chairman of @SenateForeign, I hosted a dialogue this morning with experts from across the U.S. government, and got greater clarity on efforts to detect, deter, and mitigate coronavirus.

I am closely monitoring this evolving situation and am in constant contact with the administration and our state and local partners. I have also requested the @WhiteHouse make more coronavirus test kits available to the State of Idaho.
During this novel #coronavirusoutbreak, a speedy and coordinated response is vital to our national strategy of containment. Today, I voted in support of supplemental funding to combat COVID-19.

The best thing Idahoans can do to defend against #coronavirus is remain calm, vigilant, and prepare and educate yourself.

For information and resources on the #CoronavirusOutbreak, visit my website. 
https://t.co/bFKTRgSHbh
